Plot: Hamlet told from the worm's-eye view of two minor characters, bewildered Rosencrantz and Guildenstern. Echoes of Waiting for Godot resound, reality and illusion mix, and where fate leads heroes to a tragic but inevitable end.
Characters: Horatio, Polonius, Laertes, Rosencrantz and Guildentstern, Claudius, Gertrude, Ophelia, King Hamlet
